column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Troy - Thanks for your review! I'm glad you enjoyed our ramen and are able to compare it to other ramen bowls you have tried around the U.S. In regards to the cabbage topping
column2: did you inform your server that you wanted bok choy instead of regular cabbage? We do offer bok choy (it's the baby bok choy you mention) as an additional topping
column3: which we label as such to avoid confusion with any of our other vegetable toppings. But from the tone of your review
column4: that doesn't sound like it was a dealbreaker! Thank you for dining with us
column5: and we look forward to serving you again soon.
